title: Old School OST 2003 (Unofficial Soundtrack)
description:
Old School OST 2003 (Unofficial Soundtrack)

Considering the movie makers never released an official soundtrack for the movie, I decided to make my own. The songs are by the artists credited on IMDB and in the order they appeared in the film. The files are all MP3 format, but they come from many sources and the bit rate and quality to vary. The only song I could not find is Ã¢â‚¬Å“Clowning AroundÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ by Sharkfinn. If you have found this track please let me know, and I will update the torrent. I also did not include a couple of the kidÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s songs from the birthday party scene.
